item.description:
On Memorial Day the MFA (Museum of Fine Arts) is having an Open House. Admission is free for everyone. The event runs from 10 am to 4:45 pm. I will be there around 1pm to meet up with the group.

Admission also includes "The Secrets of Tomb 10A: Egypt 2000 BC." Highlights also include films, art activities, and performances.
The web site to the event is: http://www.mfa.org/ca...

The museum is accessible by the T. Take the T on the E/Green line to the Museum Stop.

Afterwards, if people want to we can go somewhere for something to eat or drink.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send more details closer to the date.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Free Community Day at MFA
